pets.name: Leonard
pets.about: Leonard is a friendly and energetic Golden Retriever who loves to play fetch and swim. He's great with families and other dogs. Leonard is looking for an active home where he can get plenty of exercise and cuddles.

pets.name: Ian
pets.about: Ian is a cheerful and loyal Labrador mix with a heart full of love. He enjoys long walks and is perfect for families with children. Ian is well-behaved and house-trained.
health: Up to date on flea prevention

pets.name: Tyrone
pets.about: Tyrone is an intelligent and protective German Shepherd who bonds deeply with his family. He's trained in basic obedience and would do best in a home with an experienced dog owner. Tyrone loves playing and going on adventures.

pets.name: Zweily
pets.about: Zweily is a beautiful Siamese mix with striking blue eyes and a vocal personality. She's playful, intelligent, and loves interactive toys. Zweily would be perfect for someone looking for an affectionate and entertaining feline companion.

pets.name: Tatin
pets.about: Buddy is a friendly and loyal dog who loves people and outdoor activities. He enjoys long walks, playing fetch, and relaxing by your side after a fun day. Buddy is great with families and would thrive in an active home with space to move around.

pets.name: Jayjo
pets.about: Kiwi is a colorful and energetic conure who loves attention and interaction. He enjoys perching on shoulders, mimicking sounds, and playing with bird-safe toys. Kiwi would do best with an owner who has time to socialize and bond with him daily.

pets.name: Jiweb
pets.about: Shadow is a calm and affectionate long-haired cat who enjoys quiet companionship. He loves gentle brushing, window watching, and warm sleeping spots. Shadow would be perfect for a relaxed home or first-time cat owner.

pets.name: Kelly
pets.about: Clover is a sweet and gentle rabbit with floppy ears and a curious personality. She enjoys fresh veggies, hopping around safely, and gentle human interaction. Clover would be a great companion for a calm household.
